title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Red car driving on a rainy day in the city, stopping at an intersection.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the road. The traffic light is red, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the red traffic light. It is stopping at the intersection to let the pedestrian cross the street safely. The ego vehicle is also being cautious of the other cars on the road and maintaining a safe distance from them.
